Name: Module 7: Legacy Building – Purpose, Vision, and Giving Back
Course Units: Section 1: "What's Legacy?" Visioning Icebreaker (https://www.notion.so/Section-1-What-s-Legacy-Visioning-Icebreaker-f7a1ae4c930d477b8f95dab239f7189b?pvs=21), Section 2.5: Community Over Labels – Breaking "Us vs Them" (https://www.notion.so/Section-2-5-Community-Over-Labels-Breaking-Us-vs-Them-59b47f044c774af38417d355c91da3b7?pvs=21), Section 2: Legacy Inventory – What You're Already Building (https://www.notion.so/Section-2-Legacy-Inventory-What-You-re-Already-Building-e95509a790a34bd58aed99ae0e55216e?pvs=21), Section 3: Personal Purpose Statement Workshop (https://www.notion.so/Section-3-Personal-Purpose-Statement-Workshop-ad4234e8d39545688ceb91b73eca421d?pvs=21), Section 4: Legacy Mapping – Ripple Effects & Community Networks (https://www.notion.so/Section-4-Legacy-Mapping-Ripple-Effects-Community-Networks-dfc6fbb145064c8e9dd2910f635a30c8?pvs=21), Section 5: Tribe Commitment – Named Roles & Obligations (https://www.notion.so/Section-5-Tribe-Commitment-Named-Roles-Obligations-d863ed56d5204634b9c67720ad3b47c3?pvs=21), Section 6: Legacy Transfer – "From Me to We" (https://www.notion.so/Section-6-Legacy-Transfer-From-Me-to-We-947660bb55f44636a517faa775048422?pvs=21), Section 7: Storytelling for Legacy (https://www.notion.so/Section-7-Storytelling-for-Legacy-88a1ecae4ecb4ef584f847f196d591be?pvs=21), Section 8: Passing the Torch – Graduation Reframed (https://www.notion.so/Section-8-Passing-the-Torch-Graduation-Reframed-173ed4c5b5af4cbb8534d0f202d0b441?pvs=21), Section 9: Final Reflection & Commitment (https://www.notion.so/Section-9-Final-Reflection-Commitment-64ddb14242de4098bf61bdadb781079f?pvs=21)
Description: Legacy word association, Legacy Inventory (already building), Community Over Labels (Chetty social capital research), Purpose Statement Workshop with Purpose + Role Micro-Activity (who are you responsible to), Legacy Mapping with ripples diagram, Legacy Claim Ceremony, Tribe Commitment Card (REQUIRED 6-month role), Legacy Transfer to Playbook, Passing the Torch ceremony.

Name: Module 8: From Obsession to Legacy - Owning Your Story
Course Units: Activity 8.1: Legacy Story Draft (Pre-Work) (https://www.notion.so/Activity-8-1-Legacy-Story-Draft-Pre-Work-29d2ffb0dbfe425aa7a5fd93ed64e22b?pvs=21), Activity 8.2: Story Stewardship Filter (https://www.notion.so/Activity-8-2-Story-Stewardship-Filter-322df10070374160b24aa35fae89f3e4?pvs=21), Activity 8.3: Witness Circle (Small, Structured) (https://www.notion.so/Activity-8-3-Witness-Circle-Small-Structured-68054ce1b05244899e256ca3b85e51b1?pvs=21), Activity 8.4: Role Declaration (Public, Brief) (https://www.notion.so/Activity-8-4-Role-Declaration-Public-Brief-88fa0f3ed68f4fe4916be71088bb387b?pvs=21), Activity 8.5: The Legacy Ledger (Collective Asset) (https://www.notion.so/Activity-8-5-The-Legacy-Ledger-Collective-Asset-cf6319485d27404f9a0f50991609d811?pvs=21), Activity 8.6: Passing of Custody (Closing Ritual) (https://www.notion.so/Activity-8-6-Passing-of-Custody-Closing-Ritual-55267247eb804c7c97f95e0755e60b22?pvs=21), Assignment 8.A: 30-Day Follow-Through (Post-Grad) (https://www.notion.so/Assignment-8-A-30-Day-Follow-Through-Post-Grad-6b8f0a6b77684002b2b475b80731f8d9?pvs=21), Assignment 8.B: First Give-Back (Post-Grad) (https://www.notion.so/Assignment-8-B-First-Give-Back-Post-Grad-f93abb2d97fe42a0b936b5b4f6004426?pvs=21)
Description: Legacy Story Draft (1-2 pages pre-work), Story Stewardship Filter (🟢🟡🔴 marking: Now/Later/Never), Witness Circle (3-4 people, 60 seconds, no advice/praise), Role Declaration (THRESHOLD MOMENT: alumni role + 30-day action + accountability person), Legacy Ledger submissions (compiled into Playbook), Passing of Custody ritual (sign Alumni Ledger, receive token), 30-Day Follow-Through post-grad, First Give-Back (1 hour service in 60 days).

Name: Module 1.5: Personality & Energy Profile (BPEP)

Description: Become a culture carrier. Leadership Inventory (Witness→Mirror→Culture Holder→Regulator→Executor→Pillar progression), alumni panel interviews, Builder Feedback Framework, coaching triads, co-design alumni network structure, mentorship matching. REQUIRED: Pay-It-Forward Pledge (NON-NEGOTIABLE graduation requirement: 1 hr/month for 6 months).

Name: Module 4: Entrepreneurship 101 – From Problem to MVP
Course Units: Unit 0: From "Entrepreneur" to "Builder" (https://www.notion.so/Unit-0-From-Entrepreneur-to-Builder-1a7fc66a9c054c2ea568d7ef11781a31?pvs=21), Unit 10: Pitch Workshop—Selling Your Vision (https://www.notion.so/Unit-10-Pitch-Workshop-Selling-Your-Vision-872e387ef7e7447fbae4fe09a180553e?pvs=21), Unit 11: Module 4 Wrap & Next Steps (https://www.notion.so/Unit-11-Module-4-Wrap-Next-Steps-a0fa515fee3f451fbcbba9ae1607f196?pvs=21), Unit 1: Myth-Busting—What Entrepreneurship Isn't (https://www.notion.so/Unit-1-Myth-Busting-What-Entrepreneurship-Isn-t-23b4f059bc3941dcae9024a1504fcbfd?pvs=21), Unit 2: Problem Scavenger Hunt—Finding Ideas Close to Home (https://www.notion.so/Unit-2-Problem-Scavenger-Hunt-Finding-Ideas-Close-to-Home-2890374df8774cb0a7cc16fae83d8473?pvs=21), Unit 3: Idea Generation Jam—Brainstorming Solutions (https://www.notion.so/Unit-3-Idea-Generation-Jam-Brainstorming-Solutions-2a80925c78874e67bc6a9342b7b650ef?pvs=21), Unit 4: Choosing Your Problem—Making the Commitment (https://www.notion.so/Unit-4-Choosing-Your-Problem-Making-the-Commitment-3add8cb3dc584dc9acf4a0142496cbc0?pvs=21), Unit 5: Customer Discovery—Talk to Real People (https://www.notion.so/Unit-5-Customer-Discovery-Talk-to-Real-People-3429b64616c044b3b0ae89601058e2f6?pvs=21), Unit 6: MVP Design—Building Your First Version (https://www.notion.so/Unit-6-MVP-Design-Building-Your-First-Version-8c2370d0da724de487b8986ed9446f9f?pvs=21), Unit 7: Launch Witness System—Tribe as Momentum Holder (https://www.notion.so/Unit-7-Launch-Witness-System-Tribe-as-Momentum-Holder-7320fd84028145d8bc0b78edc5d9169a?pvs=21), Unit 8: Pricing Your MVP—What to Charge (https://www.notion.so/Unit-8-Pricing-Your-MVP-What-to-Charge-0c2bde52eb5149efa64bf3586e6ed074?pvs=21), Unit 9: MVP Launch Week—Test Your Idea (https://www.notion.so/Unit-9-MVP-Launch-Week-Test-Your-Idea-db1c17dd485f47028c93351a5063981a?pvs=21)
Description: Turn obsession into venture. Myth-busting, problem scavenger hunt (10+ problems filtered through nervous system), SCAMPER ideation (20+ solutions), customer discovery (3 interviews using The Mom Test), MVP Canvas (must fit BOA), Launch Witness System (MVP Sprint Groups), pricing, launch (3+ customers with evidence), 60-second pitch, 30-day business plan. REQUIRED: Problem Selection Filter (must discard 1 idea), MVP launch evidence for module completion.
